abstract: After a string of better-than-expected results, Microsoft and Amazon throw some cold water on the markets.
snippet: After a string of better-than-expected results, Microsoft and Amazon throw some cold water on the markets.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were mixed Friday as broad market indexes finished slightly higher and the Nasdaq fell for the first time in 12 sessions, weighed down by disappointing results from Microsoft and Amazon.

headline.main: Latest Earnings Cause Wall Street to Pause
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Takes a Break As Earnings Disappoint
